org.asoem.greyfish.core.environment

Interface Environment<A extends Agent<?>>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Basic2DEnvironment, BasicEnvironment, DiscreteTimeEnvironment<A>, SpatialEnvironment2D<A,Z>, SynchronizedAgentsEnvironment<A>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Abstract2DEnvironment, AbstractEnvironment, DefaultBasic2DEnvironment, DefaultBasicEnvironment, Generic2DEnvironment

    public interface Environment<A extends Agent<?>>
    A Simulation is an environment for interacting agents.

    • Method Detail

      • filterAgents

        java.lang.Iterable<A> filterAgents(com.google.common.base.Predicate<? super A> predicate)
        Get all agents in this simulation which satisfy the given predicate.
        Parameters:
        predicate - the predicate to check each agent against
        Returns:
        all agents which satisfy the given predicate

      • getActiveAgents

        Get all agents in this simulation.
        Returns:

      • getStatusInfo

        java.lang.String getStatusInfo()
